description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take control of Quinbu and collect enough coins to clear each stage. Plan your route carefully and use the environment to your advantage to ensure you get to the end of the level without running out of energy. Collect the secret objects in each level to help Qunibu rebuild his ship and return home!
